about_the_game:
RPGGAME


how to play

1: double click game.exe
2: setting graphics and click play
3: click the 'LAUNCH' Multiple time
4: enjoy the game


key setting

MOUSE LEFT: MOVE
MOUSE LEFT: ATTACK


graphic setting

fantastic-high
speed-low

about this game

Very Awesome and fun RPG Game

WOLF IS DEFALT ENEMY
AND DRAGON IS MAIN BOSS

I HOPE YOU GUYS ENJOY THIS GAME


RPGGAME

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
